scripts.bootstrap: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk bootstrap --profile development
scripts.bootstrap-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk bootstrap --profile production
scripts.build: npm run build-infra && npm run build-server
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk deploy --require-approval never --profile development && node ./scripts/uploadLayer.js
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk deploy --require-approval never --profile production
scripts.diff: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=development cdk diff --profile development
scripts.diff-prod: npm run build && cross-env INFRA_ENV=production cdk diff --profile production
scripts.offline: npm run build-server && set APP_ENV=Offline && node ./dist/entry.js
